column1: Timbaúba is a city in Pernambuco
column2: Brazil. According to the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics
column3: it has an estimated population of 51.770 inhabitants as of 2009.

column1: Boundaries - Paraiba state (N); Vicência (S); Macaparana (W); Aliança
The main economic activities in Timbaúba are based in commerce and agribusiness
column3: and raising livestock such as cattle

column1: The main sport in Timbaúba is football
column2: which is represented by Timbaúba Futebol Clube
column3: currently playing the Campeonato Pernambucano's Série A2.
